==== Notes ====
Take Karmic as your OS. Karmic supports the 7 configurable keys on top of the keyboard, Jaunty doesn't.

To let the internal mic work I changed the alsa configuration. I also played a little with the <code>alsamixer</code>.

<code>$sudo vim /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base.conf</code>

Comment this line:

<code>#options snd-hda-intel power_save=10 power_save_controller=N</code>

Add this line:

<code>options snd-hda-intel index=0 model=auto</code>
